actions.name: Water Whip
actions.description:
Melee Spell Attack. The target must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.
On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) bludgeoning damage
and is either knocked prone or pulled up to 25 feet closer to the bender.
On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pulled or knocked prone.
